title: More dinosaurs
brief_description: Journey back millions of years to help find these mysterious and incredible giants of the past - the Dinosaurs! Travel the globe on this magical tour and discover how these fascinating creatures lived, what they were really like, and ideas on why they vanished. “More Dinosaurs” is an award-winning program that is both entertaining and informative. Explore the intriguing world of dinosaurs, a perennially popular subject for both children and adults.
